newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - FRANCE - LE MONDE OCT 31.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - FRANCE - LE MONDE OCT 31.

text.p: These are leading stories in afternoon daily Le Monde.
-- Number of jobless rose by over 170,000 in the last 12 months, due to sluggish economic activity.
-- State-owned SNCF railway chairman Louis Gallois to present workers on November 4 with an "industrial project" designed to improve comsumer service, increase market share.
-- LVMH to buy majority stake in U.S perfume retail chain DFS (Duty-Free Shoppers) for an estimated 12.6 billion francs in move to give company greater control over margins.
-- New Renault minivan withstands dive by French automobile market.
